decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s); WDLxp Lnw 11 (Existing & proposed north/west elevations), WDLxp Lse 11 (Existing & proposed south/east elevations), WDLxp Pff 11 (Existing & proposed first floor plans), WDLxp Pgf 11 (Existing & proposed ground floor plans; ), WDLxp Pr11 (Existing & proposed roof plans), WDLxp Sda 11 (Existing & proposed section) & WDLxp Sbc 11 (Existing & proposed section
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounds, in accordance with polices 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy D4of the London Plan (2021) | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment or new Order), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy 2026 (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| No part of the development hereby approved shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area. The footprint of the existing first floor balcony shall not be extended and this shall be annexed from the remainder of the roof of the extensions, as shown on the approved drawings.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).

| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved drawings, the new glass roof for the south elevation side extension hereby approved, as annotated on drawing number WDLxp Lse 11 (Existing & proposed south/east elevations) shall be obscure glazed and non-opening and retained as such in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey side extension to main flank elevation (following part demolition of existing side extension); single storey side/rear extension to outrigger; and external alterations
